sys_atf_step.description: Confirm that the following fields are visible: Time Card.Category, Time Card.Time Sheet.User, Time Card.Category.Charge Code, Time Card.Category.Account, Day, Hours, Cost, Rate Card, Day of the Week Confirm that the following fields are not visible: Time Card Confirm that the following fields are read only: Day, Hours, Cost, Time Card.Category, Time Card.Time Sheet.User, Time Card.Category.Charge Code, Time Card.Category.Account, Day of the Week Confirm that the following fields are not read only: Rate Card Confirm that the following fields are mandatory: Rate Card With a failure timeout of 5 Seconds
